News.3/2/2024: filesystem support, check out docs for all commands. Transfering ownership now availble aswell.

News.3/1/2024: Rolimons recently disabled some of their API endpoints, this was causing CharBot to say people didn't have Rolimons profiles. should be fixed but if not let me know.

News.2/29/2024: Unoffical release for CharBot Basic, report bugs to me and give me ideas or suggestions of what should be added, thanks for trying out CharBot!
